reviews.review:
基本ソフトだけ買ったのは発売当初だったのですが、ほとんど遊ばす長らく積んでいました。
今回の半額セールを機に、
やってみるかと調子に乗ってドレッジまでのキラサバ全キャラ追加購入。
(両Expansion Pack買ったけど、ドクターのセットだけ以前買ってたのでダブった。(笑))
ほぼサバイバーで丸1日ぶんの時間遊んでみたのですが、
もっと早く遊べば良かったと後悔するくらいに楽しいです。
子供2人とも一緒に遊ぼうと、子供のPC用にSteam版をもう１つ、
Switch版も中古でサイレントヒルVerなるものも購入したほど。
(あまり遊んでくれませんが。(´;ω;｀))

サバイバー、特にキラー各キャラ個性があり、なかなかに奥が深い。
あと、マップによる有利不利もありますね。
サバイバーで遊んでいる分には脱出したり、殺●れたりと勝率は五分五分な感じです。
勿論、私自身は初心者のヘタレ野良プレイヤーなので、
勝つのは一緒になった味方の方々のおかげなのですが、
上手いキラーに当たると、
まさににホラー映画さながら、なにもさせてもらえずに負ける事もしばしば。
勝ったり負けたりできるゲームって本当に面白いですよね。

開発元が決まりきったキャラやパターンで有利不利が決定され続けないように、
有利だったキャラや性能を弱体化し、その逆も行い、
丁寧に調整を続けていると知った時点で
このゲームが長い間遊ばれている理由もわかりました。

難点は、私、全キャラ一気買いしたのはいいのですが、
今のとこマトモに使えるキャラがサバ1人。(汗)
パーク増やして、レベル上げるのにかなり時間を要する点かな..。
いろんなキャラやパークを使いまくりたいです。

真的不是我要歧視大陸人，但Dead by daylight遇到的外掛幾乎都是中文ID，點進去幾乎都有VAC封鎖紀錄，
而且開得有夠高調的，不是一瞬間修開所有發電機，就是把自己的跑速加到比鬼還快，然後再來哭「我们中国人只是人口基数大所以外挂看起来才多啦！」
怎麼不去死一死

收尸，速修，制作组就是三叉戟的戟头
玩家就是戟把
eu deixei todo mundo nivel 40 pra compartilhar os perks ai eles atualizaram e perdi todo o progresso de compartilhamento de perks parabens a atualização ficou um lixo
dead hard's new animation funny haha

I have only been playing for about 5 days now, and while my experience so far has been pretty fun and thrilling I'd say it has been equally if not more frustrating and annoying.

If you love stomping all over 4 people in a game with absolutely no threat to you while fulfilling some sadistic domination power fetish as a killer, this game is for you!

If you love getting absolutely shit stomped in solo queue by some overpowered killers and perks along with 3 randoms who you have no communication with as survivors, then you will probably love this game!

This game actually feels kind of fun when you get a pre-made group of survivors that actually try to work together, but it is still entirely overshadowed by the sheer power and oppressiveness that killers have in the game.

solo queue has devolved into a mode where every survivor fends for themselves until the hatch opens and they can finally make an escape. In most games if you actually try and save your teammates and work together, it will most likely just end up with every survivor dying to the killer.

Camping killers practically run the game, and there is next to no downside to having them camp because all of the survivors will either be working much slower on the objectives, or try and save their hooked teammate, only leading to more deaths and more hooking.

I'll finish this off by saying that the Exposed debuff on survivors is probably one of the worst offenders of poor design in this game. It makes the game entirely frustrating and not fun at all for survivors when they can get one shot from full hp. Especially when killers already have a million and one ways to already track and catch up to survivors.

I personally cant recommend this game if you plan on going in it as a survivor player. If you think you are going to be a killer main, you will probably have lots of fun and enjoyment. If you plan on being a survivor main, be ready to feel completely powerless over a majority of what happens in your game.
the state of this game after the update is disgusting. the camping and tunneling is a joke
It will devour your soul but you get to meet some real nice people :D
The only thing scarier than the killers is your own team mates as a survivor
abgesehen von dem das Be Haver nicht selbst das spiel spielt und das man es merkt ist es ganz ok :)

Sehr empfehlenswertes Spiel, welches Taktik, Spaß und Horror fein zusammenfasst. Leider wurde mit dem letzen Update (Juli) vieles vor die Wand gefahren, unter anderem auch der Spielspaß als Surviver. Trotz dessen ist das Spiel noch spielbar, insbesondere zu fünft in eigenen Lobbys.
Em geral o jogo é excelente, o problema maior dele é o matchmaking, outro problema é a demora pra encontrar partidas quando vc joga de killer, mas isso é de menos. Tirando isso o jogo é perfeito

Been playing this game for 5 years. I used to love it. It was a blast and I could goof around and have fun. The game is borderline unplayable now. The community is garbage and toxic. The devs are too focused on what crossover to add next than fixing the base game mechanics. When you are a new player with Ash rank you get placed against players who are gold or iridescent ranks and have a skill level that far surpasses your own. You get absolutely decimated and the opposing players will do so in the most toxic fashion possible. This game is not fun, don't waste 20$ or even 8$ on this game and definitely don't waste your time.
fun, survivor tough at first but easier as you play killer little easier at lower ranks

Good day.

depois que nerfaram os survivors, o jogo ficou pior doque ja era antes, se quiser jogar de killer, são 3h de fila, se quiser jogar de survivor, tem que passar 3h no gerador e fugindo de killer tryhard e buffado tudo ao mesmo tempo, ESTOU COMPLETAMENTE ARREPENDIDO DE TER GASTO MEU DINHEIRO SUADO PARA COMPRAR O JOGO E AINDA MAIS 5 DLC's... seu eu pudesse pediria o reembolso de tudo, o jogo é bom, porém até HORRIVEL depois desse ultimo patch... sem contar q o jogo vive crashando, as vezes são 2/3x seguidas, isso quando vc ta jogando de boa e do nada crasha no meio da partida, e o pior que vc ainda toma punição (time out) pq o jogo entende que vc quitou... da feio já, cheio de bug's, crash,s e ainda nerfam 39 perks que n precisava.

Overall the game is fun trying to trick the killers and hunting down survivors!
